Class JsonHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.dao.helper.JsonHelper

public class JsonHelper
extends Object
    A helper class for JSON functionality.

      • getKeyValue

        public <T> T getKeyValue(JSONObject jsonObject,
                         Object key,
                         Class<T> classType)
        Gets key value from the specified JSON object. The method throws an exception, when specified key does not exist.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the return type
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - the JSON object that contains the key value
        key - the key name
        classType - the class to cast the result to
        Returns:
        the key value

      • objectToJson

        public String objectToJson(Object object)
                    throws IllegalStateException
        Serializes any Java value as JSON output.
        Parameters:
        object - the Java object to be serialized
        Returns:
        the JSON representation of the object
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - when an I/O error occurs

      • unmarshallJsonToListOfObjects

        public <T> List<T> unmarshallJsonToListOfObjects(Class<T> classType,
                                                 String jsonContent)
                                          throws IOException
        Deserializes JSON content from given JSON content String to a list of objects.
        Parameters:
        classType - the class type of the object
        jsonContent - the JSON string
        Returns:
        the object
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error in unmarshalling

      • unmarshallJsonToObject

        public <T> T unmarshallJsonToObject(Class<T> classType,
                                    String jsonContent)
                             throws IOException
        Deserializes JSON content from given JSON content String.
        Parameters:
        classType - the class type of the object
        jsonContent - the JSON string
        Returns:
        the object
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error in unmarshalling
